tool_input.description: Copy updated settings to project .claude directory
Force copy updated settings to project .claude directory
Use create-rule script to install Claude Code hooks at user level

tool_input.command:
git add . && git commit -m "$(cat <<'EOF'
fix: configure hooks to use user-level ~/.claude directory

- Update settings.json to point to ~/.claude/hooks/ instead of .claude/hooks/
- Install hooks at user level using create-rule.js for claude-code tool
- Fix hook path resolution issue preventing proper execution
- Hooks now properly execute from user's global Claude Code configuration

The hooks will now work correctly across all Claude Code sessions.

🤖 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.ai/code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)"
